details.description: The Away Team Jersey for Team B is perfect for fans who want to represent their favorite team. With its distinctive blue and yellow colors, this jersey is not just a piece of sportswear but a symbol of team pride and unity.

The Third Kit Jersey for Team C is a stylish and modern choice for football enthusiasts. Featuring a sleek black and green design, this jersey combines fashion and sportswear seamlessly. Whether you're on the field or cheering from the sidelines, this jersey makes a bold statement.
features: Ideal for both casual and sporty looks

details.description: Support National Team X with this vibrant jersey showcasing the team's iconic colors. The eye-catching yellow, blue, and red color combination ensures you stand out in the crowd. Made from breathable cotton fabric, this official jersey is a must-have for every devoted fan.
features: Eye-catching yellow, blue, and red color combination
Official jersey of National Team X
